snippet: Despite having had four consecutive winning seasons, the Falcons, who will play the Giants on Sunday, have not won a single playoff game during that period.
abstract: Atlanta Falcons, who are preparing to face New York Giants in first round of playoffs, have had four consecutive winning seasons but have not won a single playoff game during that period.
lead_paragraph: Despite having had four consecutive winning seasons, the Falcons, who will play the Giants on Sunday, have not won a single playoff game during that period.

headline.seo: Falcons Shoot for a Rarity: A Playoff Win
headline.main: Falcons Still Pursuing Elusive Playoff Victory
headline.print_headline: Falcons Still Pursuing Elusive Playoff Victory
